description: Types of things. All things of the same type have a similar set of characteristics.
name: Types

addedBy.description: The user who added a thing to a library of things.
addedBy.name: Added by
addedBy.shortDescription: Who added a thing to a library.

addedOn.description: The date and time when a thing was added to a library of things.
addedOn.name: Added on
addedOn.shortDescription: Day and time when a thing was added to a library.

canRead.description: The users and groups of users allowed to read a thing's properties.
canRead.name: Can read
canRead.shortDescription: Who can view a thing's properties?

canWrite.description: The user and groups of users allowed to change a thing's properties.
canWrite.name: Can write
canWrite.shortDescription: Who can change a thing's properties?

hasAttended.description: Events like meetings, talks, seminars, and courses that a user has attended.
hasAttended.name: Attended
hasAttended.shortDescription: Things (events) that a user has attended.

hasListenedTo.description: Media or events a user has listened to.
hasListenedTo.name: Listened to
hasListenedTo.shortDescription: Things a user has listened to.

controller.description: The user who controls access to an object.
controller.name: Controller

shortDescription.description: Text that describes an object in less than 80 characters.
shortDescription.name: Short description
shortDescription.shortDescription: Text that briefly describes an object.

tags.description: Key words or phrases that describe an object.
tags.name: Tags
tags.shortDescription: Key words or short phrases that describe an object.
